alert.note: Alert for Green Lake (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:08PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Green Lake, northeastern Columbia and northwestern Dodge Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 708 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cambria, or 13 miles east of Portage, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45-50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beaver Dam, Columbus, Pardeeville, Randolph, Fall River, Rio, Cambria, Fox Lake, Wyocena, Friesland, Kingston, Doylestown, Astico, Danville, South Beaver Dam, and Dalton. This includes U.S. Highway 151 between mile markers 119 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
